short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and restore your browser sessions with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of losing all your open tabs and windows when you close your browser? Session Saver allows you to easily save your current browsing session and restore it whenever you need it. Whether you’re working on a project, researching, or just want to keep important tabs for later, Session Saver simplifies browser session management.

Key Features:

	•	Save Current Session: Capture all open tabs and windows and store them for later.
	•	Restore Sessions: Reopen all saved tabs and windows with a single click.
	•	Simple and Fast: Manage your browsing sessions effortlessly without complicated settings.

Premium Features (Coming Soon):

	•	Multiple Sessions: Save and organize multiple sessions for different projects or tasks.
	•	Cloud Sync: Access your sessions from any device with cloud syncing.
	•	Advanced Organization: Tag and categorize your sessions for easier management.

Try Session Saver today and never lose your browsing progress again!
